showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // Heidegger
“Gya haah hah hah!
The first problem's already solved!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “Meteor will soon be
smashed to bits!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // “The plan is already in motion.
We are collecting Huge Materia
from each region.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // Scarlet
“Huge Materia is a high-density,
special type of Materia made through
a special compression process
in Mako reactors.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // Rufus
“You're going to ram Meteor?”{PAUSE}“Do you think
we have the technology to do it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // Heidegger
“We've already collected
Materia from Nibelheim.”{PAUSE}“All that's left are
{CYAN}Corel{WHITE} and {CYAN}Fort Condor{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “I've already dispatched troops
to Corel.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Gyaa haa ha ha!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // Rufus
“Now then…
We're faced with two issues.”{PAUSE}“1 Destroy Meteor.
2 Remove the barrier around North Cave
and defeat Sephiroth.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Any ideas?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // Rufus
“What?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “The energy extracted from it
is 330 times the strength
of normal Materia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Kya, ha, ha!
How about that!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “We will gather all the Huge Materia together
and ram it into Meteor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “That will cause a huge explosion,
reducing Meteor literally to bits!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // Scarlet
“First things first!”{PAUSE}“Right now, we've got to
collect Huge Materia from each area.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // Scarlet
“Kya, haa, haa.
What is it Reeve?
You're speaking strangely.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // Scarlet
“Kya, ha, ha.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // Heidegger
“Huh? Why are you
giving the orders?”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Gyaa haa ha ha!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // Heidegger
“Don't be foolish!
I don't remember anyone
putting you in charge!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // Heidegger
“The Peace Preservation force
will do their best
to beat the enemy!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // Heidegger
“Because of them, I…
I…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // Heidegger
“The President is dead!
Now I'm doing things my way!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Gyaa haa ha ha!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // Reeve
“Not the President.
To Sister Ray!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // Reeve
“None of that matters!”{PAUSE}“The reactor's output is
increasing all by itself!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // Reeve
“We can't do that!
It's inoperable!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // Reeve
“I don't care how you do it!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // Reeve
“Looks like {Cloud} and
the others are on their way.
Stay out of the way!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Reeve
“That's a private matter…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // Reeve
“Hey! Wait!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // Reeve
“{Cloud}, everybody!
Sorry…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Reeve
“But!!”
